meanings.definition: The quality or state of being daily.
meanings.sent1: The dailynesses of the sunrise and sunset bring comfort and routine to our days.
meanings.sent2: She found joy in the dailynesses of her morning coffee and evening walk.
meanings.sent3: The dailynesses of brushing his teeth with his eyes closed always made her giggle.
meanings.sent4: The dailynesses of the ticking clock reminded her of the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The dailynesses of the chirping birds at dawn painted a peaceful picture in her mind.

meanings.definition: The routine or habitual nature of daily life.
meanings.sent1: In the dailynesses of work, he found a sense of purpose and structure.
meanings.sent2: The dailynesses of cooking dinner and doing laundry filled her days.
meanings.sent3: The dailynesses of his cat knocking over the same plant every day never failed to amuse her.
meanings.sent4: The dailynesses of the crowded bus ride felt like a never-ending journey.
meanings.sent5: The dailynesses of her mother's warm hugs provided a sense of security and love.
